name: PowerShell / CMD session tracking
desc: A report from Red Canary said PowerShell is the most prevalent Mitre Attack technique (T1059.001). This Project helped the Customer have insight into PowerShell (ab)use in their Environment

name: FIM - File Integrity Monitoring
desc: This project helped some financial companies that needed to track changes performed on critical folders/shares: who did what on which file/folder and when ?

name: Splunk Enterprise Security (SIEM) deployment
desc: Deployed SIEM (Splunk Enterprise Security) for several companies, including banks and airports

name: RDP / SSH Access tracking
desc: This Project helped the Customer have insight on SHH/RDP access on their critical servers: user, cmd, source & target machines, duration...
